hero_description: We offer comprehensive solutions related to the supply of vegetable oils as well as the reception and storage of extruding oils.
hero_background_alt: Photo showing a square full of containers with oils
section_2_background_alt: Photo of black oil in details
text_box_li_1: Vegetable oils from gastronomic premises or food production companies.
text_box_li_2: Animal fats cat. 1, cat. 2 and cat. 3 - from the Meat Processing Plant.
text_box_li_3: Fatty acids and other products used for biocomponents.
text_box_li_4: Base oils SN 85, SN 100, SN 150, SN 500, BS 150.
text_box_li_5: Type A urea (used e.g. for AdBlue production).
text_box_li_6: Biodiesel catalysts: methanol, potassium hydroxide and sodium hydroxide.
text_box_li_7: We mediate in the supply of ethanol.
advanced_box_2_title: Research and assessment of utility parameters
advanced_box_1_description: We thoroughly check the properties of materials and structural elements of machines and devices to make sure that they are able to withstand loads and work trouble -free.
advanced_box_2_description: We pour oils, fuels and lubricants to make sure that they meet the requirements and ensure optimal operation of the machines.
advanced_box_3_description: We issue reliable opinions and expert opinions on the tested samples and technological processes used.
advanced_box_4_description: We review and verify technological installations to identify potential problems and provide their safe and efficient work.
advanced_box_alt_3: Cloud icon with a light bulb
